Class WelcomeRMIServerImplementation

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.server.rmi.WelcomeRMIServerImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
WelcomeRMIServer, Serializable, Remote
public class WelcomeRMIServerImplementation extends UnicastRemoteObject implements WelcomeRMIServer
Implementation of the RMI server that handles the creation of new instances of RMIServerImplementation.
